member.name: M:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.Engine.FileNameMapper.BuildFilenameCache(System.Xml.XmlNode)
member.summary: Build Cache of filenames

remarks.para: walk through the XML documentation and determine the filename for each relevant ID.
Ensure these filenames are unique, then save these filenames in a hashtable for later use.

member.name: M:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.Engine.FileNameMapper.CacheTypes(System.Xml.XmlNodeList)

member.name: M:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.Engine.FileNameMapper.CacheMembers(System.Xml.XmlNodeList,System.Xml.XmlNode)

member.name: M:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.Engine.FileNameMapper.GetHashCodeForId(System.String)
member.summary: Generate a HashCode for the given ID
member.returns: A hash code as an 8 character string
member.remarks:
This is based on the classic hash alogrithm attributed to Dan Bernstein. It is used in cdb, Berkley DB, Perl, and pretty much everywhere else.
Surprise, surprise, it gives exactly the same results as the .Net v1.1 String.GetHashCode() .......

member.param: CRef for which the name will be looked up.

member.name: M:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.Engine.MsdnXsltUtilities.HasSimilarOverloads(System.String)
member.summary: Looks up, whether a member has similar overloads, that have already been documented.
member.returns: true, if there has been a member with the same description.

remarks.para: On the members pages overloads are cumulated. Instead of adding all overloads to the members page, a link is added to the members page, that points to an overloads page.
If for example one overload is public, while another one is protected, we want both to appear on the members page. This is to make the search for suitable members easier.

This leads us to the similarity of overloads. Two overloads are considered similar, if they have the same name, declaring type, access (public, protected, ...) and contract (static, non static). The description contains these four attributes of the member. This means, that two members are similar, when they have the same description.

Asking for the first time, if a member has similar overloads, will return false. After that, if asking with the same description again, it will return true, so the overload does not need to be added to the members page.

member.name: M:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.Engine.MsdnXsltUtilities.Replace(System.String,System.String,System.String)

member.name: T:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config
member.summary: Config settings for the native Html Help 2 Documenter

member.name: M:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.#ctor(NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2DocumenterInfo)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the NativeHtmlHelp2Config class.

member.name: M:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.CreateDocumenter
member.summary: Creates an instance of a documenter

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.OutputDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the OutputDirectory property.
member.remarks: The folder where the root of the HTML set will be located. This can be absolute or relative from the .ndoc project file.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.HtmlHelpName
member.summary: Gets or sets the HtmlHelpName property.
member.remarks: The HTML Help project file and the compiled HTML Help file use this property plus the appropriate extension as names.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the Title property.
member.remarks: This is the title displayed at the top of every page.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.RegisterTitleWithNamespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the RegisterTitleWithNamespace property
member.remarks: Should the compiled Html 2 title be registered on this machine after it is compiled. Good for testing. (If true CollectionNamespace is required)

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.CollectionNamespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the CollectionNamespace property
member.remarks: The Html Help 2 registry namespace (avoid spaces). Used in conjunction with GenerateCollectionFiles and RegisterTitleWithNamespace

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.RegisterTitleAsCollection
member.summary: Gets or sets the RegisterTitleAsCollection property
member.remarks: If true the HxS title will be registered as a collection (ignored if RegisterTitleWithNamespace is true)

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.GenerateCollectionFiles
member.summary: Gets or sets the GenerateCollectionFiles property
member.remarks: If true creates collection files to contain the help title. These all the title to be plugged into the Visual Studio help namespace during deployment.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.PlugInNamespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the PlugInNamespace property
member.remarks: If GenerateCollectionFiles is true, the resulting collection will be plugged into this namespace during deployment

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.CollectionTOCStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the CollectionTOCStyle property
member.remarks: Determines how the collection table of contents will appear in the help browser

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.LangID
member.summary: Gets or sets the LangID property
member.remarks: The language ID of the locale used by the compiled helpfile

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.BuildSeparateIndexFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the BuildSeparateIndexFile property
member.remarks: If true a seperate index file is generated, otherwise it is compiled into the HxS (recommended)

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.DocSetList
member.summary: Get's or sets the DocSetList property
member.remarks: A comma-seperated list of DocSet filter identifiers in which topics in this title will included.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.Version
member.summary: Get's or sets the version property
member.remarks: The version number for the help file (#.#.#.#)

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.CreateFullTextIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the CreateFullTextIndex property
member.remarks: If true creates a full text index for the help file

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.IncludeDefaultStopWordList
member.summary: Gets or sets the IncludeDefaultStopWordList property
member.remarks: If true the default stop word list is compiled into the help file. (A stop word list is a list of words that will be ignored during a full text search)

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.UseHelpNamespaceMappingFile
member.summary: Gets or sets the UseHelpNamespaceMappingFile property.
member.remarks: If the documentation includes references to types registered in a seperate html help 2 namespace, supplying a mapping file allows XLinks to be created to topics within that namespace.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.HeaderHtml
member.summary: Gets or sets the HeaderHtml property.
member.remarks: Raw HTML that is used as a page header instead of the default blue banner. %FILE_NAME%\" is dynamically replaced by the name of the file for the current html page. %TOPIC_TITLE%\" is dynamically replaced by the title of the current page.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.FooterHtml
member.summary: Gets or sets the FooterHtml property.
member.remarks: Raw HTML that is used as a page footer instead of the default footer. %FILE_NAME% is dynamically replaced by the name of the file for the current html page. %ASSEMBLY_NAME% is dynamically replaced by the name of the assembly for the current page. %ASSEMBLY_VERSION% is dynamically replaced by the version of the assembly for the current page. %TOPIC_TITLE% is dynamically replaced by the title of the current page.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.IntroductionPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the IntroductionPage property
member.remarks: An HTML page that will be dispayed when the root TOC node is selected.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.AboutPageInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the AboutPageInfo property
member.remarks: Displays product information in Help About.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.EmptyIndexTermPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the EmptyIndexTermPage property
member.remarks: Displays when a user chooses a keyword index term that has subkeywords but is not directly associated with a topic itself.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.NavFailPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the NavFailPage property
member.remarks: Page that opens if a link to a topic or URL is broken.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.AboutPageIconPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the AboutPageIconPage property
member.remarks: HTML file that displays the Help About image.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.AdditionalContentResourceDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the AdditionalContentResourceDirectory property
member.remarks: Directory that contains resources (images etc.) used by the additional content pages. This directory will be recursively compiled into the help file.

member.name: P:NDoc3.Documenter.NativeHtmlHelp2.NativeHtmlHelp2Config.ExtensibilityStylesheet
member.summary: Gets or sets the ExtensibilityStylesheet property
member.remarks: Path to an xslt stylesheet that contains templates for documenting extensibility tags.
